title: Soy Leaf Garden Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Raw, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out
description: A 100% vegan coffee shop and smoothie bar in a train caboose located in the Blossom Valley neighborhood since June 2015. Serves a variety of coffee drinks, tea, smoothies and food. Order at the window for either take-out or sit in the garden. In Sept 2015, started offering breakfast and lunch. All food is pre-packaged and changes daily. Items include blueberry oatmeal squares and chia seed pudding for breakfast. Lunch salads include shirazi, kale and three bean and wraps include spicy Thai peanut, Mediterranean, and black bean tempeh. Uses local, organic, fair trade products when possible. Dog friendly.
